parameters.name: DeployRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the related resources reside.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token that is used to retrieve the next page of results.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region. Set the value to cn-hangzhou.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the cloud resource.

parameters.name: ResourceProduct
parameters.description: The code of the product to which the cloud resource belongs.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the cloud resource.
